targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team1) then id else null end) as "Team1: Total PR Opened",
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team2) then id else null end) as "Team2: Total PR Opened"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team1) then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as "Team1: PR Opened per Member",
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team2) then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as "Team2: PR Opened per Member",
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) from users) as "Org: PR Opened per Member"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in ($team1) and merged_date is not null then id 
    when team_id in ($team1) and merged_date is null then null end) as "Team1: Total PR Merged",
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in ($team2) and merged_date is not null then id 
    when team_id in ($team2) and merged_date is null then null end) as "Team2: Total PR Merged"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in ($team1) and merged_date is not null then id 
    when team_id in ($team1) and merged_date is null then null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as "Team1: PR Merged per Member",
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in ($team2) and merged_date is not null then id
    when team_id in ($team2) and merged_date is null then null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as "Team2: PR Merged per Member",
  count(distinct case when merged_date is not null then id end)/(select count(*) from users) as "Org: PR Merged per Member"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
  	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  -- count(i.id) as 'Issues Opened',
  count(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team1) then id else null end) as 'Team1: Issues Completed',
  count(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team2) then id else null end) as 'Team2: Issues Completed'
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
  	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team1) then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as 'Team1: Issues Completed per Member',
  count(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team2) then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as 'Team2: Issues Completed per Member',
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) from users) as "Org: Issues Completed per Member"
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
  	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  -- count(i.id) as 'Issues Opened',
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team1) then story_point else 0 end) as 'Team1: Story Points Completed',
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team2) then story_point else 0 end) as 'Team2: Story Points Completed'
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

matcher.options: Team1: Story Points Completed per Member
Team2: Story Points Completed per Member

targets.rawSql:
with _issues as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
  	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team1) then story_point else 0 end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as 'Team1: Story Points Completed per Member',
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in ($team2) then story_point else 0 end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as 'Team2: Story Points Completed per Member',
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: Story Points Completed per Member"
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

with _merged_prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    prc.id as comment_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
    and pr.merged_date is not null
)

select
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team1) then comment_id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as "Team1: PR Review Depth",
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team2) then comment_id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as "Team2: PR Review Depth",
  count(distinct comment_id)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: PR Review Depth"
FROM _merged_prs
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: Average PR Review Depth per Team

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    prc.commit_sha,
    c.additions + c.deletions as loc,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join pull_request_commits prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    left join commits c on prc.commit_sha = c.sha
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
)

select
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  sum(case when team_id in ($team1) then loc else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as "Team1: PR Size",
  sum(case when team_id in ($team2) then loc else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as "Team2: PR Size",
  sum(loc)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: PR Size"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: 4. PR Review Depth and PR Size

targets.rawSql:
with _bugs as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
  	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
    and i.type = 'BUG'
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(case when team_id in ($team1) then id else null end) as 'Team1: P0/P1 Bugs',
  count(case when team_id in ($team2) then id else null end) as 'Team2: P0/P1 Bugs'
FROM _bugs
WHERE
  -- please choose the priorities in the filter above
  priority in ($priority)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _bugs as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
  	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
    and i.type = 'BUG'
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(case when team_id in ($team1) then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team1)) as 'Team1: P0/P1 Bugs per Member',
  count(case when team_id in ($team2) then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in ($team2)) as 'Team2: P0/P1 Bugs per Member',
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: P0/P1 Bugs per Member"
FROM _bugs
WHERE
  -- please choose the priorities in the filter above
  priority in ($priority)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.author_id,
    min(c.authored_date) as first_commit_authored_date,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    min(prc.created_date) as first_comment_date,
    max(prc.created_date) as last_comment_date,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    left join pull_request_commits prc2 on pr.id = prc2.pull_request_id
    left join commits c on prc2.commit_sha = c.sha
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,5,8,9,10,11,12
),

_deduped_prs as(
  SELECT distinct 
    id,
    url,
    first_commit_authored_date,
    pr_issued_date,
    first_comment_date,
    last_comment_date,
    pr_merged_date,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team
  FROM _prs
  WHERE
    -- remove edge data and make data scope for all cycle time metrics consistent
    (first_commit_authored_date is null or first_commit_authored_date < pr_issued_date)
    and (first_comment_date is null or pr_issued_date < first_comment_date)
    and (last_comment_date is null or first_comment_date < last_comment_date)
    and (pr_merged_date is null or first_comment_date < pr_merged_date)
),

_coding_pickup_review_time as(
  SELECT 
    id,
    url,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team,
    pr_issued_date,
    case when first_commit_authored_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_commit_authored_date,pr_issued_date)/60 end as coding_time,
    case when first_comment_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,pr_issued_date,first_comment_date)/60 end as pickup_time,
    case when $review_end_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_comment_date,$review_end_date)/60 end as review_time
  FROM _deduped_prs
),

_cycle_time as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    case when coding_time is null and pickup_time is null and review_time is null then null else coalesce(coding_time,0) + coalesce(pickup_time,0) + coalesce(review_time,0) end as cycle_time 
  FROM _coding_pickup_review_time
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in ($team1) then cycle_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Cycle Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in ($team2) then cycle_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Cycle Time(h)'
FROM _cycle_time
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.author_id,
    min(c.authored_date) as first_commit_authored_date,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    min(prc.created_date) as first_comment_date,
    max(prc.created_date) as last_comment_date,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    left join pull_request_commits prc2 on pr.id = prc2.pull_request_id
    left join commits c on prc2.commit_sha = c.sha
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,5,8,9,10,11,12
),

_deduped_prs as(
  SELECT distinct 
    id,
    url,
    first_commit_authored_date,
    pr_issued_date,
    first_comment_date,
    last_comment_date,
    pr_merged_date,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team
  FROM _prs
  WHERE
    -- remove edge data and make data scope for all cycle time metrics consistent
    (first_commit_authored_date is null or first_commit_authored_date < pr_issued_date)
    and (first_comment_date is null or pr_issued_date < first_comment_date)
    and (last_comment_date is null or first_comment_date < last_comment_date)
    and (pr_merged_date is null or first_comment_date < pr_merged_date)
),

_coding_pickup_review_time as(
  SELECT 
    id,
    url,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team,
    pr_issued_date,
    case when first_commit_authored_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_commit_authored_date,pr_issued_date)/60 end as coding_time,
    case when first_comment_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,pr_issued_date,first_comment_date)/60 end as pickup_time,
    case when $review_end_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_comment_date,$review_end_date)/60 end as review_time
  FROM _deduped_prs
),

_cycle_time as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    case when coding_time is null and pickup_time is null and review_time is null then null else coalesce(coding_time,0) + coalesce(pickup_time,0) + coalesce(review_time,0) end as cycle_time 
  FROM _coding_pickup_review_time
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in ($team1) then coding_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Coding Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in ($team2) then coding_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Coding Time(h)'
FROM _cycle_time
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.author_id,
    min(c.authored_date) as first_commit_authored_date,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    min(prc.created_date) as first_comment_date,
    max(prc.created_date) as last_comment_date,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    left join pull_request_commits prc2 on pr.id = prc2.pull_request_id
    left join commits c on prc2.commit_sha = c.sha
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,5,8,9,10,11,12
),

_deduped_prs as(
  SELECT distinct 
    id,
    url,
    first_commit_authored_date,
    pr_issued_date,
    first_comment_date,
    last_comment_date,
    pr_merged_date,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team
  FROM _prs
  WHERE
    -- remove edge data and make data scope for all cycle time metrics consistent
    (first_commit_authored_date is null or first_commit_authored_date < pr_issued_date)
    and (first_comment_date is null or pr_issued_date < first_comment_date)
    and (last_comment_date is null or first_comment_date < last_comment_date)
    and (pr_merged_date is null or first_comment_date < pr_merged_date)
),

_coding_pickup_review_time as(
  SELECT 
    id,
    url,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team,
    pr_issued_date,
    case when first_commit_authored_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_commit_authored_date,pr_issued_date)/60 end as coding_time,
    case when first_comment_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,pr_issued_date,first_comment_date)/60 end as pickup_time,
    case when $review_end_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_comment_date,$review_end_date)/60 end as review_time
  FROM _deduped_prs
),

_cycle_time as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    case when coding_time is null and pickup_time is null and review_time is null then null else coalesce(coding_time,0) + coalesce(pickup_time,0) + coalesce(review_time,0) end as cycle_time 
  FROM _coding_pickup_review_time
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in ($team1) then pickup_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Pickup Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in ($team2) then pickup_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Pickup Time(h)'
FROM _cycle_time
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.author_id,
    min(c.authored_date) as first_commit_authored_date,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    min(prc.created_date) as first_comment_date,
    max(prc.created_date) as last_comment_date,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    left join pull_request_commits prc2 on pr.id = prc2.pull_request_id
    left join commits c on prc2.commit_sha = c.sha
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,5,8,9,10,11,12
),

_deduped_prs as(
  SELECT distinct 
    id,
    url,
    first_commit_authored_date,
    pr_issued_date,
    first_comment_date,
    last_comment_date,
    pr_merged_date,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team
  FROM _prs
  WHERE
    -- remove edge data and make data scope for all cycle time metrics consistent
    (first_commit_authored_date is null or first_commit_authored_date < pr_issued_date)
    and (first_comment_date is null or pr_issued_date < first_comment_date)
    and (last_comment_date is null or first_comment_date < last_comment_date)
    and (pr_merged_date is null or first_comment_date < pr_merged_date)
),

_coding_pickup_review_time as(
  SELECT 
    id,
    url,
    user_name,
    team_id,
    team,
    pr_issued_date,
    case when first_commit_authored_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_commit_authored_date,pr_issued_date)/60 end as coding_time,
    case when first_comment_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,pr_issued_date,first_comment_date)/60 end as pickup_time,
    case when $review_end_date is null then 0 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,first_comment_date,$review_end_date)/60 end as review_time
  FROM _deduped_prs
),

_cycle_time as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    case when coding_time is null and pickup_time is null and review_time is null then null else coalesce(coding_time,0) + coalesce(pickup_time,0) + coalesce(review_time,0) end as cycle_time 
  FROM _coding_pickup_review_time
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in ($team1) then review_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Review Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in ($team2) then review_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Review Time(h)'
FROM _cycle_time
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _merged_prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
    and pr.merged_date is not null
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team1) and id not in (SELECT pull_request_id FROM pull_request_comments) then id else null end) as "Team1: PRs Merged w/o Review",
  count(distinct case when team_id in ($team2) and id not in (SELECT pull_request_id FROM pull_request_comments) then id else null end) as "Team2: PRs Merged w/o Review"
FROM _merged_prs
GROUP BY 1

list.definition: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from teams
list.label: Team1
list.name: team1
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from teams

list.definition: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from teams
list.label: Team2
list.name: team2
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from teams

list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos

list.label: Board
list.name: board_id
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from boards

list.definition: select distinct priority from issues where priority != ''
list.label: P0+P1 Priority
list.name: priority
list.query: select distinct priority from issues where priority != ''

list.label: Review End Date
list.name: review_end_date
list.query: PR Merged Date : pr_merged_date, Last Comment Date : last_comment_date

title: Engineering Throughput and Cycle Time - Team View
